020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Collections.addAll;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.createDebugOutput;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidArgument;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
034
035import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
036import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
037import java.lang.reflect.Type;
038import java.util.ArrayList;
039import java.util.Collection;
040import java.util.EnumSet;
041import java.util.HashSet;
042import java.util.List;
043import java.util.Set;
044
045import org.apiguardian.api.API;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.UnexpectedExceptionError;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
051import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.CodeBlock;
052import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.FieldSpec;
053import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
054import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
055import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeSpec;

059/**
060 *  The implementation for
061 *  {@link FieldSpec}.
062 *
063 *  @author Square,Inc.
064 *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065 *  @version $Id: FieldSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
066 *  @since 0.0.5
067 *
068 *  @UMLGraph.link
069 */
070@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: FieldSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
071@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
072public final class FieldSpecImpl implements FieldSpec
073{
074        /*---------------*\
075    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
076        \*---------------*/
077    /**
078     *  The implementation of
079     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.FieldSpec.Builder}
080     *
081     *  @author Square,Inc.
082     *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
083     *  @version $Id: FieldSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
084     *  @since 0.0.5
085     *
086     *  @UMLGraph.link
087     */
088    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: FieldSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
089    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
090    public static final class BuilderImpl implements FieldSpec.Builder
091    {
092            /*------------*\
093        ====** Attributes **===================================================
094            \*------------*/
095        /**
096         *  The annotations for the field.
097         */
098        private final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations = new ArrayList<>();
099
100        /**
101         *  The reference to the factory.
102         */
103        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
104        private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
105
106        /**
107         *  The initializer for the field.
108         */
109        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
110        private CodeBlockImpl m_Initializer = null;
111
112        /**
113         *  The Javadoc comment for the field.
114         */
115        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
116        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Javadoc;
117
118        /**
119         *  The modifiers for the field.
120         */
121        private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers = EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class );
122
123        /**
124         *  The name for the field.
125         */
126        private final String m_Name;
127
128        /**
129         *  The type for the field.
130         */
131        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
132        private final TypeNameImpl m_Type;
133
134            /*--------------*\
135        ====** Constructors **=================================================
136            \*--------------*/
137        /**
138         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
139         *
140         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
141         *      builder instance.
142         *  @param  type    The type for the new field.
143         *  @param  name    The name for the new field.
144         */
145        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
146        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final TypeNameImpl type, final CharSequence name )
147        {
148            m_Composer = requireNonNullArgument( composer, "composer" );
149            m_Type = requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" );
150            m_Name = requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ).toString().intern();
151
152            m_Javadoc = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
153        }   //  BuilderImpl()
154
155            /*---------*\
156        ====** Methods **======================================================
157            \*---------*/
158        /**
159         *  {@inheritDoc}
160         */
161        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
162        @Override
163        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec )
164        {
165            m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpec, "annotationSpec" ) );
166
167            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
168            return this;
169        }   //  addAnnotation()
170
171        /**
172         *  {@inheritDoc}
173         */
174        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
175        @Override
176        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final Class<?> annotation )
177        {
178            return addAnnotation( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( annotation, "annotation" ) ) );
179        }   //  addAnnotation()
180
181        /**
182         *  {@inheritDoc}
183         */
184        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
185        @Override
186        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final ClassName annotation )
187        {
188            m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) m_Composer.annotationBuilder( requireNonNullArgument( annotation, "annotation" ) )
189                .build() );
190
191            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
192            return this;
193        }   //  addAnnotation()
194
195        /**
196         *  {@inheritDoc}
197         */
198        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
199        @Override
200        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotations( final Iterable<AnnotationSpec> annotationSpecs )
201        {
202            for( final var annotationSpec : requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpecs, "annotationSpecs" ) )
203            {
204                m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) annotationSpec );
205            }
206
207            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
208            return this;
209        }   //  addAnnotations()
210
211        /**
212         *  {@inheritDoc}
213         */
214        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
215        @Override
216        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final CodeBlock block )
217        {
218            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( block );
219
220            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
221            return this;
222        }   //  addJavadoc()
223
224        /**
225         *  {@inheritDoc}
226         */
227        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
228        @Override
229        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final String format, final Object... args )
230        {
231            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
232
233            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
234            return this;
235        }   //  addJavadoc()
236
237        /**
238         *  {@inheritDoc}
239         */
240        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
241        @Override
242        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Modifier... modifiers )
243        {
244            addAll( m_Modifiers, requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) );
245
246            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
247            return this;
248        }   //  addModifiers()
249
250        /**
251         *  {@inheritDoc}
252         */
253        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
254        @Override
255        public final FieldSpecImpl build() { return new FieldSpecImpl( this ); }
256
257        /**
258         *  Sets the initializer for the field.
259         *
260         *  @param  codeBlock   The code that initialises the field.
261         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
262         */
263        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
264        @Override
265        public final BuilderImpl initializer( final CodeBlock codeBlock )
266        {
267            checkState( isNull( m_Initializer ), () -> new IllegalStateException( "initializer was already set" ) );
268            var codeBlockImpl = (CodeBlockImpl) requireNonNullArgument( codeBlock, "codeBlock" );
269            if( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
270            {
271                codeBlockImpl = (CodeBlockImpl) createDebugOutput( true )
272                    .map( DebugOutput::asComment )
273                    .map( m_Composer::codeBlockOf )
274                    .map( block -> block.join( "\n", codeBlock ) )
275                    .orElse( codeBlock );
276            }
277            m_Initializer = codeBlockImpl;
278
279            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
280            return this;
281        }   //  initializer()
282
283        /**
284         *  Sets the initializer for the field.
285         *
286         *  @param  format  The format.
287         *  @param  args    The arguments.
288         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
289         */
290        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
291        @Override
292        public final BuilderImpl initializer( final String format, final Object... args )
293        {
294            return initializer( m_Composer.codeBlockOf( format, args ) );
295        }   //  initializer()
296    }
297    //  class Builder
298
299        /*------------*\
300    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
301        \*------------*/
302    /**
303     *  The annotations for the field.
304     */
305    private final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations;
306
307    /**
308     *  The reference to the factory.
309     */
310    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
311    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
312
313    /**
314     *  Lazily initialised return value of
315     *  {@link #toString()}
316     *  for this instance.
317     */
318    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
319
320    /**
321     *  The initializer for the field.
322     */
323    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
324    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Initializer;
325
326    /**
327     *  The Javadoc comment for the field.
328     */
329    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
330    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Javadoc;
331
332    /**
333     *  The modifiers for the field.
334     */
335    private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers;
336
337    /**
338     *  The name for the field.
339     */
340    private final String m_Name;
341
342    /**
343     *  The static imports.
344     */
345    private final Set<String> m_StaticImports;
346
347    /**
348     *  The type of the field.
349     */
350    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
351    private final TypeNameImpl m_Type;
352
353        /*--------------*\
354    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
355        \*--------------*/
356    /**
357     *  Creates a new {@code FieldSpecImpl} instance.
358     *
359     *  @param  builder The builder.
360     */
361    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
362    public FieldSpecImpl( final BuilderImpl builder )
363    {
364        m_Composer = builder.m_Composer;
365        m_Type = builder.m_Type;
366        m_Name = builder.m_Name;
367        m_Javadoc = builder.m_Javadoc.build();
368        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( builder.m_Annotations );
369        m_Modifiers = Set.copyOf( builder.m_Modifiers );
370        m_Initializer = isNull( builder.m_Initializer )
371            ? (CodeBlockImpl) m_Composer.emptyCodeBlock()
372            : builder.m_Initializer;
373
374        final Collection<String> staticImports = new HashSet<>( m_Javadoc.getStaticImports() );
375        staticImports.addAll( m_Initializer.getStaticImports() );
376        m_StaticImports = Set.copyOf( staticImports );
377
378        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
379    }   //  FieldSpecImpl()
380
381        /*---------*\
382    ====** Methods **==========================================================
383        \*---------*/
384    /**
385     *  Creates a builder for an instance of {@code FieldSpec} from the given
386     *  type, name and modifiers.
387     *
388     *  @param  type    The type of the {@code FieldSpec} to build.
389     *  @param  name    The name for the new field.
390     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers.
391     *  @return The new builder.
392     *
393     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
394     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
395     */
396    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
397    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
398    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
399    public static final BuilderImpl builder( final Type type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
400    {
401        final var retValue = builder( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ), name, modifiers );
402
403        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
404        return retValue;
405    }   //  builder()
406
407    /**
408     *  Creates a builder for an instance of {@code FieldSpec} from the given
409     *  type, name and modifiers.
410     *
411     *  @param  type    The type of the {@code FieldSpec} to build.
412     *  @param  name    The name for the new field.
413     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers.
414     *  @return The new builder.
415     *
416     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
417     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
418     */
419    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
420    @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
421    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
422    public static final BuilderImpl builder( final TypeName type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
423    {
424        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
425
426        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( composer, (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ), requireValidArgument( name, "name", JavaUtils::isValidName, $ -> format( "not a valid name: %s", name ) ) )
427            .addModifiers( requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) );
428
429        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
430        return retValue;
431    }   //  builder()
432
433    /**
434     *  Creates a builder for an instance of {@code FieldSpec} from the given
435     *  type, name and modifiers.
436     *
437     *  @param  type    The type of the {@code FieldSpec} to build.
438     *  @param  name    The name for the new field.
439     *  @param  modifiers   The modifiers.
440     *  @return The new builder.
441     *
442     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
443     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
444     */
445    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
446    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
447    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
448    public static BuilderImpl builder( final TypeSpec type, final CharSequence name, final Modifier... modifiers )
449    {
450        final var typeName = ClassNameImpl.from( EMPTY_STRING, requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ).name().orElseThrow( () -> new ValidationException( "Anonymous class cannot be used as type for a field" ) ) );
451        final var retValue = builder( typeName, name, modifiers );
452
453        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
454        return retValue;
455    }   //  builder()
456
457    /**
458     *  Emits this {@code FieldSpec} instance to the given code writer.
459     *
460     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
461     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
462     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
463     *      output target.
464     */
465    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
466    public final void emit( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
467    {
468        codeWriter.emitJavadoc( m_Javadoc );
469        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( m_Annotations, false );
470        codeWriter.emitModifiers( m_Modifiers, implicitModifiers );
471        codeWriter.emit( "$T $L", m_Type, m_Name );
472        if( !m_Initializer.isEmpty() )
473        {
474            codeWriter.emit( " = " );
475            codeWriter.emit( m_Initializer );
476        }
477        codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
478    }   //  emit()
479
480    /**
481     *  {@inheritDoc}
482     */
483    @Override
484    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
485    {
486        var retValue = this == o;
487        if( !retValue && (o instanceof FieldSpecImpl) )
488        {
489            retValue = (getClass() == o.getClass()) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
490        }
491
492        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
493        return retValue;
494    }   //  equals()
495
496    /**
497     *  Returns the
498     *  {@link JavaComposer}
499     *  factory.
500     *
501     *  @return The reference to the factory.
502     */
503    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
504    public final JavaComposer getFactory() { return m_Composer; }
505
506    /**
507     *  Returns the Javadoc for this field.
508     *
509     *  @return The Javadoc.
510     *
511     *  @since 0.2.0
512     */
513    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
514    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
515    public final CodeBlockImpl getJavadoc() { return m_Javadoc; }
516
517    /**
518     *  Returns the static imports for this code block.
519     *
520     *  @return The static imports.
521     */
522    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
523    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
524    public final Set<String> getStaticImports() { return m_StaticImports; }
525
526    /**
527     *  {@inheritDoc}
528     */
529    @Override
530    public final int hashCode() { return hash( m_Composer, toString() ); }
531
532    /**
533     *  Checks whether the field has an initializer.
534     *
535     *  @return {@code true} if the field has an initializer, {@code false}
536     *      otherwise.
537     */
538    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
539    public final boolean hasInitializer() { return !m_Initializer.isEmpty(); }
540
541    /**
542     *  {@inheritDoc}
543     */
544    @Override
545    public final boolean hasModifier( final Modifier modifier ) { return m_Modifiers.contains( modifier ); }
546
547    /**
548     *  The initializer for
549     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
550     *
551     *  @return The return value for
552     *      {@link #toString()}.
553     */
554    private final String initializeCachedString()
555    {
556        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
557        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( m_Composer, resultBuilder );
558        try
559        {
560            emit( codeWriter, Set.of() );
561        }
562        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
563        {
564            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
565        }
566        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
567
568        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
569        return retValue;
570    }   //  initializeCachedString()
571
572    /**
573     *  {@inheritDoc}
574     */
575    @Override
576    public final Set<Modifier> modifiers() { return m_Modifiers; }
577
578    /**
579     *  {@inheritDoc}
580     */
581    @Override
582    public final String name() { return m_Name; }
583
584    /**
585     *  {@inheritDoc}
586     */
587    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
588    @Override
589    public final BuilderImpl toBuilder()
590    {
591        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( m_Composer, m_Type, m_Name );
592        retValue.m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_Javadoc );
593        retValue.m_Annotations.addAll( m_Annotations );
594        retValue.m_Modifiers.addAll( m_Modifiers );
595        retValue.m_Initializer = m_Initializer.isEmpty() ? null : m_Initializer;
596        return retValue;
597    }   //  toBuilder()
598
599    /**
600     *  {@inheritDoc}
601     */
602    @Override
603    public final String toString()
604    {
605        final var retValue = m_CachedString.get();
606
607        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
608        return retValue;
609    }   //  toString()
610
611    /**
612     *  {@inheritDoc}
613     */
614    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
615    @Override
616    public final TypeNameImpl type() { return m_Type; }
617}
618//  class FieldSpecImpl
619
620/*
621 *  End of File
